derivation: from G473 (ἀντέχομαι) and the middle voice of G2192 (ἀντέχομαι);
strongs_def: to hold oneself opposite to, i.e. (by implication) adhere to; by extension to care for
outline:
1. to hold before or against, hold back, withstand, endure
  2. to keep one's self directly opposite to any one, hold to him firmly, cleave to, paying heed to him
